  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"grant_type":{"type":"string","const":"password","example":"password"},"username":{"example":"","type":"string"},"password":{"example":"","type":"string"},"client_id":{"type":"string","const":"iab","example":"iab"},"client_secret":{"type":"string","const":"milesight*iab","example":"milesight*iab"}},"required":["grant_type","username","password","client_id","client_secret"]}}}}}

</RequestSchema>
